alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland; Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 5:01AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bay, northwestern Saginaw and southern Midland Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 501 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Louis, or near Alma, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Merrill around 515 AM EDT. Freeland around 525 AM EDT. Midland around 530 AM EDT. Auburn around 535 AM EDT. Bay City, Kawkawlin, Essexville and Linwood around 545 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Laporte, Averill, Gordonville, Hemlock, Porter Township, Crump, Poseyville, Willard and Bay City State Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
